location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Plate III. Plate showing Pattern of Numerals as worn on Shoulder Straps of Regiments’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 60 x 130 mm, on sheet 315 x 187 mm.Materials: Printed in colour on paper.

mods.abstract: Illustrations of the Arabic numerals 1-9 and 0, with an additional illustration of a shoulder strap for the Naib Dowumof the 10th (Qahreman) Cavalry Regiment, indicating the placement of the regiment number.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
